about.title: About Me
about.description: Developer focused on creating efficient and intuitive web solutions. With experience in frontend and backend, I use technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and React to turn ideas into quality products. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to apply and expand my knowledge, with a focus on optimization and best development practices.

experience.title: Experience
experience.web_developer_description: Development of full-stack web applications, from designing the RESTful API with Node.js and Express to implementing reactive user interfaces with React and TypeScript. Main project: Breaking Locations (Beta), a platform for the breaking community to find training spots.
experience.computer_technician_description: Diagnosis, repair, and assembly of computers, as well as technical support for users. This experience enhanced my problem-solving and customer service skills.
experience.systems_analysis_degree_title: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
experience.systems_analysis_degree_description: Degree focused on the entire software development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, software architecture, and database design. I learned to develop robust and scalable solutions, applying the best market practices.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Below are some projects that demonstrate my skills in action. Each one represents a different challenge, from the conception of the idea to the final implementation, using the most appropriate technologies for each case.
